about_the_game:
Well this is a standard normal RPGmaker game.

An ancient evil has arisen to threaten the world and an equally ancient and ritualized journey must be under taken to save said world. Gathering the power of the legendary Crystals, becoming the Legendary Hero, meeting your fated Hero Companions and defeating the Lich.

Hopefully nothing will happen to complicate this simple dance.

This game includes:
- Turn based combat
- Tricky dungeon puzzles
- Terrible, terrible choices
- Cooking mechanics!
- The inevitable extinction of mankind

content_descriptors.notes:
Netorare or NTR: A loved one being stolen away.  A form of pornographic tragedy.
Giant Squirrels: Yes, loved ones being stolen away by giant squirrels.  Using their penis.
Sex: Consensual sex in the missionary position for the purposes of procreation.

name: Squirrel Legacy Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo U7600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

reviews:
“When I think about the vast cornucopia of fetishes that mankind has discovered and shared, being cucked by a giant squirrel is most definitely not on that list. I don't know what's wrong with you, but can I offer some different fetishes to consider?”
Random Forum User

“The story is weird but funny also sometimes hilarious”

short_description: Gather the power of the legendary Crystals, become the Legendary Hero, meet your trusty Hero Companions and defeat the Lich! Except maybe you shouldn't trust all of your Hero Companions.
